Parameter.name: hostname
Parameter.label: Host Name
Parameter.description: URL or IP for the instance.

Parameter.name: client_id
Parameter.label: Organization Key
Parameter.description: Can be received through the Developer Portal by selecting Credentials and pressing the Create App button.

Parameter.name: client_secret
Parameter.label: API Secret
Parameter.description: Can be received through the Developer Portal by selecting Credentials and pressing the Create App button.

Parameter.name: events_per_poll
Parameter.label: Events Per Poll
Parameter.description: Max number of records to return per poll. Note: a large fetch may cause timeout errors.

Parameter.name: initial_event_fetch_period
Parameter.label: Initial Event Fetch Period in Days
Parameter.description: Number of days in the past from which events will be initially retrieved.

Parameter.name: report_types
Parameter.label: Report Types
Parameter.description: Comma-separated list of report types to poll.

Parameter.name: piis_to_exclude
Parameter.label: Personal Identifiable Information to Exclude
Parameter.description: Comma-separated list of Personal Identifiable Information (PII) to exclude.
